pageContext.claim: “You know, what they [Amazon] have is a very uneven playing field. You look at the sales tax situation.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump suggests Amazon gets preferential sales tax treatment at the state and local level. Amazon charges sales taxes in the 45 states that have them. It also charges local sales taxes in some but not all jurisdictions that have them. Nearly half of items sold on Amazon.com are actually sold by third-party vendors. Amazon offers to collect sales taxes for these vendors where applicable, but does not require vendors to charge these taxes.
